data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: After this third judgment the sorcerers recognized that it was the hand of God as they were unable to duplicate it. However Pharaoh's heart ____ still ____. It ____ almost a whole ____ to ____ Pharaoh. It ____ appear ____ Moshe ____ Aaron ____ appeared ____ Pharaoh ____ Spring ____ early Summer. The plagues continued through the summer, autumn and they came out in the beginning of spring in the month of Nisan on the Hebrew calendar.
data.partBlankContent: After this third judgment the sorcerers recognized that it was the hand of God as they were unable to duplicate it. However Pharaoh's heart w__ still hard____. It to__ almost a whole ye__ to wea___ Pharaoh. It wo___ appear th__ Moshe a__ Aaron fi___ appeared t_ Pharaoh la__ Spring o_ early Summer. The plagues continued through the summer, autumn and they came out in the beginning of spring in the month of Nisan on the Hebrew calendar.
data.answer: 这第三次审判以后，行法术的才知道这是神的手，因为他们不能复制。然而法老的心还是刚硬。他们花了将近一整年的时间才削弱法老的力量。摩西和亚伦第一次出现在法老面前似乎是在春末夏初。瘟疫持续了整个夏秋，在希伯来历的尼散月，即春天初爆发。
